"Switching Subpalettes":
"You have access to multiple Subpalettes that you can switch between whenever you like.
To switch Subpalette, open the Main Palette list with <%PaletteReverse>/<%PaletteForce>, then follow the following steps:
・Switch to the Subpalette list (<%SubPaletteLeft>/<%SubPaletteRight>)
・Cycle through your Subpalettes (<%PaletteReverse>/<%PaletteForce>)
・Select a Subpalette to use (<%Decide>)"
